item.description:
Reminder of our meeting on Tuesday of this week.

Our next meeting will be Tuesday, May 7th from 7-9 at the Senior Center Lounge.

With Fibromyalgia Awareness Day fast approaching on May 12th I'd like you to put out the word to anyone in your world who would benefit from our group so they can start a new lease on life and realize there is hope for recovery and that there are many others that understand what it means to have Fibromyalgia.

We will be sharing information, triumphs and challenges as usual.

So glad the winter is over and I won't be delayed in Newark with any luck this trip!

Remember if anyone wants to have a demonstration of the LaserTouch One Pain Device I can do it before the meeting if you come early just let me know in advance. My numbers are 623-251-7547/617-943-5570.

I will be giving a lecture at the Natural Food Exchange on Thursday May 9th at 7 PM on microcurrent/cold laser technology and why it works so well for chronic pain and fibromyalgia. I'll be doing free demos there as well.

 

Donations greatly appreciated to defray my costs
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the Senior Center Lounge, elevator to right on first floor through double doors
item.name: Have a Support Group meeting
